players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Is there a mafioso among us?"
You: "Be careful, I might be the mafioso. Don't trust everyone."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't think you're the mafioso. If you were, you would have killed me last night."

players.name: Charlie

Bob: "Be careful, I might be the mafioso. Don't trust everyone."
You: "Bob, I don't think you're the mafioso. If you were, you would have killed me last night."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Is there a mafioso among us?"
Bob: "Be careful, I might be the mafioso. Don't trust everyone."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't think you're the mafioso. If you were, you would have killed me last night."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
